entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is described as having a presence of mind that the narrator would never have expected from him.

entities.name: bertha jorkins
entities.description: Bertha Jorkins is introduced as someone who might have ruined all, but instead proved to be a gift beyond the narrator's wildest dreams.

relationships.description: Wormtail convinced Bertha Jorkins to accompany him on a nighttime stroll, where he overpowered her and brought her to the narrator.
Wormtail brought Bertha Jorkins to the narrator.
The narrator could not possess Bertha Jorkins, but instead disposed of her after extracting all useful information from her.
Bertha Jorkins told the narrator that Wormtail knew of a faithful Death Eater who would be willing to help the narrator.
